resources.string: To use this feature, you need to grant the microphone permission. Please grant the permission to continue.
You have denied the microphone permission multiple times. To use this feature, please enable the permission in the app settings.
To use this feature, you need to grant the %1$s permission. Please grant the permission to continue.
To ensure the app functions correctly during background recording, please allow notifications. This is due to OS restrictions.
If you go back, the recording will be stopped and saved. Are you sure you want to continue?
